Reviews.Title: Refurbished LG Verizon Chocolate cell phone
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: Dont waste your time & money ordering a used phone.  Paid $53.00 total w/shipping & it didnt even last a month.  The phone just fell apart.

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I had had problems with this phone from the start.  I have had 3 replacement phone and this one and they all power off for no apparent reason.  Verizon said the problem had been fixed but this phone I got thru amazon did the same things.  Get a different phone.

Reviews.Title: Completely defective "New" housing.
Reviews.Author: Paige Walsworth
Reviews.Content: The screen half of this slider phone was taped from the inside to the main part of the phone.  Not only did it fall completely apart within days, but the screen went white and the phone quit working altogether, (Of course it couldn't work, as it could not attach to the main part of the phone!)  This is the worst experience I've ever had with a product I ordered from Amazon.  I certainly hope I get my money back quickly, so I can buy a decent phone.

Reviews.Title: lg chocolate 8500
Reviews.Author: hutsonsixpack
Reviews.Content: I don't recommend this phone at all.  The buttons are very sensitive and before you know it you are calling numbers you didn't realize you entered.  Also when your face touches the screen while on the phone you get all sorts of menus popping up.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: versie jones
Reviews.Content: This phone was a perfect starter phone for my 12 year old. If he takes care of this phone I will definitely use amazon to get him a newer phone of his desire...within my price range. I am happy!!!! Great quality. It was easy to set up with my cellular phone account as well.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy this again
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Lippincott
Reviews.Content: We needed a regular mobile phone, but we ended up getting a smart phone anyway. This phone is difficult to use.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Vrieze
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace my old LG Chocolate but I didn't want to give up this style of phone.  So I purchased a Refurbished one. The phone looks awesome and works great.

Reviews.Title: Absolute trash.
Reviews.Author: FanofCarolina
Reviews.Content: This phone was probably good nine years ago, the one I got was a piece of S***. I got so mad I crushed it and threw it away.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone!
Reviews.Author: Darcy Penrod
Reviews.Content: Works great for us. We're not super fancy, just calling and texting and the occasional picture with our cell phones. This is great--unless you're not good at texting without qwerty!

Reviews.Title: Great phone and fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: Braeden
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this LG VX8500 and it is an amazing phone! The shipping was amazingly fast. It arrived three days before the estimated arrival date. It works perfectly and came well-packed and did not have a scratch on it. charger and battery are included with package. And last but not least, it was extremely easy to set up with Verizon. I had an existing prepaid plan and they were more than happy to switch my plan over. And the process only took about 10 minutes. Overall, i would highly reccomend this phone and the price is unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: G. Gartley "gg"
Reviews.Content: no data plan required and sleek and sexy alright this phone looks and feels amazing makes good calls and is just an all around good phone

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever made
Reviews.Author: dsquezello
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the phone, RB LG VX8500 Chocolate Camera Bluetooth phone 4 Verizon.  The censor is so sensitive that when i text it sends the text message when i am actually trying to us the arrows.  At Other times the censor does not work at all.  The phone also turns the internet on when it is in my pocket which causes me to be charged for internet.  When texting, the number buttons stick and cause me to type the wrong letters.  I ended up having to buy a different charger for the phone because the original charger shorted out when using it for the first time.  The phone has never been dropped or exposed to water.  Over all i really hate this phone and want nothing to do with it nor will i ever suggest it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Loved this phone.
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I didn't have any of the problems others had with this phone. I used it for about 2 years and really liked it. It held up great to everyday use. It still looks brand new & I would still be using it, except I switched to AT&T.; By the way, big mistake there. Verizon has much better coverage and the rates were better. Stuck in a contract now.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I was amazed with my order, it came alot earlier then was supposed to, and was in great condtion.Over all great would order again if needed!

Reviews.Title: Kick Ass
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: These guys care.I bought the LG chocolate off of these guys, Some how the charger I got came apart in the phone, as soon as they heard my problem they contacted me and hooked it up. They definantly cared that I had a problem with there product, Not to mention I think I got a good deal even though the charger broke. The phone looks and works great and very well priced.

Reviews.Title: Did It's Job Wonderfully
Reviews.Author: Kelley Welu
Reviews.Content: This was the best phone I have ever had.  It has served me well for 5 years with no glitches or mess ups.  I'm sad to say my phone does have to retire as the charging outlet has broken so I have to hold the cord in a certain position in order for it to charge.  But after 5 years, that's pretty understandable and reasonable.  I tried a smartphone a couple years ago but it broke within months so I went back to the LG Chocolate.  I'm sad to see this phone go but I am ready for my next upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Poor Performance after 3 weeks.
Reviews.Author: Mike Vieira
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my girlfriend and after three weeks it started to act really glitchy. The screen would flicker on and off. And would only work about half the time. Seemed every other day it would just go into a coma then come out of it the next day. Doesn't mean that this model is bad but you might want to do plenty of research before committing your funds. Thanks.
